website_summaries.verdict: A solid blood pressure monitor with a few extras for added health tracking.
pros: Saves date and time of previous recordings, allowing users to keep close track of levels

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and convenient
customer_reviews.text: I really like this monitor and I wish I knew it existed when I was pregnant so I could track my BP better. I love that it comes in a nice plastic case for easy travel! The display shows the time, date, year, bp, and heart rate. You literally press one button and you’re good to go. For accurate results, make sure you’re sitting correctly and read the manual if you have any questions. With this price, I will be gifting my the grandparents in our family!!
customer_reviews.author: Art Ed

customer_reviews.title: Great little unit
customer_reviews.text: Great unit for a very reasonable price. As a home care nurse, I like wrist cuffs as they do not take up a lot of space and I like the ones that do not require you to have your arm at exactly the right spot for them to even start. Yes, I know that’s the most accurate way but it is very hard to do with certain patients with limited mobility. To the woman saying these are fake reviews: no, my review is 100% my own, I paid for the unit and i love it.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Ratchet

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wrist blood pressure for my mother. She was so happy as it is very easy to use (just pressing one button). There are more options of course but she is a single user so she is glad that it is not complicated in use and does not require to roll a sleeve and can be carried in a handbag. Perfect size for travelling and good size when you are using it at home.
customer_reviews.author: hanmo

customer_reviews.title: Extremely reliable for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I have purcharsed a few of these and they are so reliable and do it all! Very affordable for a medical instrument, and no price is too much when it comes to buying medical instruments for the ones you love. I would highly recommend this brand over many others.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Morales

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these for my dad and one for my grandmother which we sent overseas in a care package. They both love how easy it is to use. The big display is a huge plus for my grandmother because she has a very hard time seeing. My grandma has a very hard time moving and doctor visits are difficult for her and this is a lifesaver! She tracks her vitals daily and keeps a log in her notebook. Sometimes it's hard to get my dad to use his but since it takes less than 1 minute he doesn't really have a good excuse. I definitely recommend buying these for your loved ones especially as they get older.
customer_reviews.author: Sergiu Smerica

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use with accurate results
customer_reviews.text: My doctor insisted I start checking my blood pressure at home regularly so I wanted to get something that was convenient and easy to use. I tried a standard set that was very awkward to use so I wouldn't test as I should. After trying this wrist monitor, I absolutely will not go back. The results are accurate and easy to read. The ease of use, is phenomenal.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use and read results
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that this monitor would be hard to use and/or the data would be hard to collect but I was wrong. It is so easy!! You just strap in on your wrist and push a button. Now I have had it come up as an "Error" a couple of times and I don't know why, but other than that it has worked perfectly. The results are easy to read too as they are displayed right on the screen in big numbers when the monitor is done. It also tells you your heart rate in addition to your blood pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Engstrom

customer_reviews.title: Readings Dangerously Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: This BP wrist cuff is dangerously inaccurate. Despite following the Instructions to the letter, I received over a week's worth of readings that were so high I thought I was in imminent danger of a stroke! Went to my doctor only to find out that my pressure is completely normal. This device created far more stress than it was supposed to eliminate. Will be returning for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Y. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: So much smaller and easier to use than the arm cuff ones. You can carry it in a purse and it comes with a good if not pretty case. (Why do they always make cases with no color?) it was tricky at first because the directions are unclear and incomplete. You put it on your left wrist with palm facing up and push start then put your left arm across your chest until it releases. You have to be completely still while it takes your pressure. Works perfectly every time now.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Varn

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this product. Very handy and easy to use. It’s not sensitive like the previous ones I had where it keeps giving you an error msg everytime u move just a bit. So accurate too!
customer_reviews.author: ARNOLD SACRO

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use wrist monitor
customer_reviews.text: I love this wristband. My blood Pressure fluctuates and my doctor wants me to monitor it various times of the day,so it is so convenient to use. Simply wrap round you wrist, press button and raise your arm. It sits on my table, so I remember to use it often. I was at my dentists office the other day, and they used one of the wrist monitors on me there. So compact, can put in my purse and carry it with me. I highly recommend this to keep track of your blood pressure and pulse!
customer_reviews.author: linda j. born

customer_reviews.title: Nice, affordable, easy to use unit
customer_reviews.text: After being diagnosed with high blood pressure I needed to get something I could use at home to monitor it. I was very pleased with how easy the unit works and although it may not be as accurate as taking it manually, it certainly gives you a close reading to help monitor your pressure. The unit is well built and suites my needs perfectly!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS ONE !!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you’re reading this right now... you are me 2 weeks ago. I couldn’t decide which one to purchase? I chose this one based off ease of use and good reviews. Well, The reviews are right!! It’s perfect!! It comes with a nice carry case and it includes the batteries. It couldn’t be any easier to use. I even took it to my doctors appointment today to show my past readings on its history. I retested myself after the doctor took my pressure and my results were basically the same so it’s accurate. I think you will love it... I know I do-
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Compact and accurate
customer_reviews.text: Following the instructions the measurements are quite accurate. But if you hold a hand in different position the numbers might be a bit off. Big clear numbers, overall clean design without unnecessay fluff.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: It DOES NOT work!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! Purchased this monitor to help track my blood pressure due to high risk pregnancy but it doesn't work. The reading is never correct. Even took it in for my last visit to check with what the doctor got and mine was way off! Doctor tried working with it but couldn't get it to work correctly either.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Reed

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Receipt the product today, and the seller gave 2 pcs of batteries for free which is = very sweet, and it is very easy to use
customer_reviews.author: lazy.luo

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: This blood pressure item works very well. I have a problem with mu blood pressure and this helps me keep it in check. By taking my BP at different times of the day (when at rest or when busy), I know if I need to relax or exercise. I am truly glad I purchased this item. William Terrio
customer_reviews.author: William E. Terrio

customer_reviews.title: Great Blood Pressure monitor.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to check my blood pressure and heart rate twice a day (in the morning before I get up and before I go to bed). The BP is Pretty accurate, +/- 5 Mmhg from by doctors office machine. The heart rate is spot on. The memory function was a nice feature to take to my doctors office and keep an accurate log. So far I give it 5 stars, great value for the money. I will update if I have any issues or becomes inaccurate.
customer_reviews.author: Trey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and value.
customer_reviews.text: After years of having chronic hypertension the medication I’d been on stopped working. Starting on something new required tweaking of the dose. Running to the doctor or to the drug store where my BP could be checked frequently was not always possible. So I bought this device. I absolutely love it. It is incredibly accurate and helps me keep tabs on my BP whenever I like. I highly recommend it to anyone who wants or needs to keep track of theirs.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tool to combat white coat syndrome!
customer_reviews.text: I started going to a new doctor and was really nervous so naturally my blood pressure was high. After that visit, I purchased this monitor. I take it with me to the doctor’s office (because it is so compact) to show my pressure in between visits.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended at all!
customer_reviews.text: Not dependable at all. Took numerous readings within seconds with greatly varied results. Compared with our onsite PA and readings far off from this item. Sadly time for returning was up 6 days ago.
customer_reviews.author: Rad5030

customer_reviews.title: It's a great monitor.
customer_reviews.text: My wife needs to check her blood pressure regularly and I bought this for her thinking it would be simpler to use than her arm cuff monitor. It is and she loves it. She had an appointment with her heart doctor the day we received the monitor and we took it along and had it checked for accuracy. It was very close with the hospital's equipment and her doctor said it was entirely satisfactory. We both would recommend it for anyone that needs a monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer hj

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Update***** since leave a review customer service was great in reaching out to me and giving me a refund and letting me know that they will work on the chips in their product to work more accurately. If they fix their product and I have proof of it I would be happy to delete my review and leave a new one. Terrible do not waste your money never gives an accurate reading. Like that it comes with a protective case but it is protecting garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Jem7705

customer_reviews.title: All was good
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a quite simple and functional product, and i was happily surprized with a really good product, amazing features, can't feel better now. Another thing that i liked was the fast shipping. Recomended.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge O.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!!
customer_reviews.text: This BP cuff is not accurate at all. It is easy to operate and read but what’s the point if it’s not accurate?! I am a RN and bought this for my husband to use. I manually checked his BP several times and this cuff reads his BP significantly higher. Unfortunately I missed my Amazon return window so I’m left with this piece of junk. I’m going to contact the company directly and will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Karmine

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: That is the first portable pressure monitor I used , it is easy to use and get job done in a minute. Good customer services, and I Love both! I really would like to recommend to anyone .
customer_reviews.author: H.M

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and excellent function!
customer_reviews.text: Product was excellent, it’s easy to set up and use. It’s good for home use. Test it every day for monitoring my blood pressure. Elder people friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Leona

customer_reviews.title: Blood pressure monitor
customer_reviews.text: This blood pressure cuff is accurate and well worth the money I spent for it. It’s light and has a case for travel. I highly recommend this blood pressure cuff.
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Weatherford

customer_reviews.title: Good, Accurate Readings, Easy to Use, No Painful Squeezing!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a good BP cuff to monitor my blood pressure at home, and would rather have a wrist cuff as they are more comfortable and easy to use than traditional arm cuffs. After scouring Amazon I came across this one and after reading the other positive reviews it had I ordered it for myself. I've been using it for a few weeks now and I absolutely love it. It's quick and easy to use. I have been getting very consistent readings for my BP at home, which may differ from BP taken at a doctor's office because you are less stressed. Overall, this is definitely worth the money and a must have gadget for every household.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Salmon

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate
customer_reviews.text: I'm a doctor and sometimes I just not at home to take my mom's blood pressure so I bought her this product which is really easy to use and if she sees any abnormalities in her BP I just come around and confirm it with my BP cuff! So far is has been pretty accurate so it is to trust. Good product
customer_reviews.author: patricia mendez

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommended
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! I bought it last week for my father . He was looking for a blood preassure that could be confortable and easy to use . he lives alond and taking some reads by manual blood pressures was difficult for him ; so basically we were looking for quality and price and the most import and a cery accurate divice. About the shipment pretty fast , arrived on time and in perfect conditions !
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Leal

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, easy to use, compared with doctor's monitor
customer_reviews.text: After a exhausting review research, chose HYLOGY Blood Pressure Wrist Monitor for positive accurate reviews. Due to nerve disease cannot use arm monitor. Was easy to use. Materials used are of good quality. Must read directions carefully first. Took to doctor to see if it was accurate because using the arm monitor on the wrist was showing very high BP. Doctor had prescribed an increased dosage of meds but was waiting to take after receiving a wrist monitor. To my great relief, my BP was not increased and at the doctor's office found that the reading on the HYLOGY was accurate. Finally feel safe now.
customer_reviews.author: Karen de Young

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive way to check your blood pressure
customer_reviews.text: This device does a good job of showing your blood pressure. The numbers are big and easy to read. But you have to position it absolutely right or it won't work. So read the instructions on how to do it. If you do it right it does work.
customer_reviews.author: cm

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for 5 days before it died.  Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: It came in a hard case which was nice. Setup at first was confusing because i didn't read the instructions. Accuracy was +-5 to 10 points compared to my nurse's wrist unit. I used it from 6/25 to 6/30 wi the batteries included in the unit before it conked out. I expected this because the batteries may be old. Replaced them with new duracell batteries just purchased from costco. Tried 2 batteries, battery indicator still showed no charge. Replaced this with 2 more new ones because it might be a fluke. Well, after going through 5 changes, it is no longer a fluke. The unit is defective. Good only for 5 days. Recommendation is d DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: sphinx32r

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL/WRONG BLOOD PRESSURE READINGS. Piece of garbage
customer_reviews.text: I want a refund but missed the window. I was measuring the blood pressure against the auto machine in the supermarket and THIS device was always WAY TO HIGH (it was wrong). Meaning, it said i had serious blood pressure issues when it really was normal. BUT I waited until today when i had a regular dr appointment and then compared it to what the nurse had collected. Whereas she got a NORMAL 124 over 70, this device got a sickly145 over 98. This has happened OVER AND OVER AGAIN. Piece of garbage
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Nice bold display and size. Unfortunately the readings cannot be depended on. I am not sure, but I think it is due to inferior fabric used for the cuff. I was 181/66 at the walkin clinic. I had them recheck thinking their machine was wrong. I am not on meds to correct my b/p. Next day I used this and it was 137/67. I repositioned it and recheck, it was 110/66, repositioned again and got 120. I have continued checking since I bought it and it is too inconsistent for me to feel safe using it. I doubt the meter is defective. I think it's the cuff. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: :some people cant check someone else's blood pressure like me , i have very difficulty checking blood pressure , and my grandmother was always asking me to check her blood pressure so i never measure it accurately that's why i wanted something like which works not only automatically but accurately too ,so i decided to purchase this automatic wrist monitor , and you know what it is fantastic and simple, now my grandmother dont need me to check her blood pressure bcz she can do it alone , its usage is very easy, easy to read with large lcd screen , i recommended it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: BILLY

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry out,can put in little hand bag
customer_reviews.text: buy for mom,she had high blood pressure,she like it ,she can check her blood pressure easy,highly recommendation!
customer_reviews.author: eleen

customer_reviews.title: Sent back
customer_reviews.text: Sent back, Refunded, wasn’t accurate at all. Very difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: MBlanke

customer_reviews.title: accurate within 8 points for BP, Heart rate is within 2 points, Breathing is right on.
customer_reviews.text: good product for reference only. yes I'll keep mine, nice size for travel and I'm 100 satisfied, Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Don McCombs

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a wrist blood pressure monitor for work as I have to take vitals every night making it such a hassle to carry everything around. I’m very pleased with the price and with how quickly this was delivered. It was delivered in less than 24hrs after purchasing. The monitor is a good size as it’s not to bulky. It’s very easy to use and to see the results. I’m excited to start using it at work! It comes with a case to store it which makes it handy.
customer_reviews.author: adric

customer_reviews.title: Great cost/value ratio
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product for the price. I am pleasantly surprised by the quality: good construction, good design, and the accuracy, though not perfect, is well within acceptable range. The height at which you hold your wrist allows you to adjust the results. I find if I hold my wrist about 2 inches below heart-level the accuracy matches a more expensive/sophisticated monitor that I am replacing. Don't expect a $1,000 product but this is a good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Just Say Why dot Com

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and accurate
customer_reviews.text: I work at a Geriatric Psych Unit and this Blood Pressure cuff works great. It takes blood pressures and pulses quickly and is very accurate. Big easy to ser display and Memory recall works great. It also comes with a hard case for storage. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: FloridaBoy727

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Mom, and she finds it much easier to use than the older arm cuff BO monitor she had. Her doctor tells her that wrist cuffs are not as accurate, and when tested in office her BP is at least 10 points lower than the wrist cuff indicates. But I am sometimes tested with a wrist cuff in my own doctor's office, so take from that what you will. 4 stars for prompt delivery and a perfectly functioning product, -1 star for the poor translations and BP disparity.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: It worked
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this a family member that needs to monitor their BP daily. It is +/- 5 from the doctor's office. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Laroche

customer_reviews.title: Great little gadget that actually works
customer_reviews.text: I've been using a manual BP cuff and stethoscope for years and have tried other wrist monitors in the past, but they usually were erratic at best. I've tested this wrist monitor several times against my manual cuff and it's almost dead on each time. Wish I had found this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah B

customer_reviews.title: Do not waist your money
customer_reviews.text: I went back to use the traditional one in the shoulder because this one keeps showing errors over and over, even with new batteries. Do not waist your money and energy on this product. My intention was to get a smaller blood pressure to carry inside my purse and this one looked practical but is a bad product. After 2 weeks bad.
customer_reviews.author: Guana Me

customer_reviews.title: Accuracy?
customer_reviews.text: Works for a quick check but sometimes 2 minutes later the numbers are very skewed from previous test and worrisome. I can feel the difference in my BP so I know when it should read higher and it let's me know but never compared to any other device to see how close numbers are.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Schneebeli

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job with no outlandish readings
customer_reviews.text: Most of these give readings that are way off of what they should. I have had some that say every patient has hypertension. With this one I get good readings every time and every patient tells me that it is accurate for what they usually get! I will continue to use this brand and suggest it as a brand my patients can use at home!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: This is what I want
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted to have a blood pressure monitor at home, because i sometimes want to check it myself. This monitor is so easy to use. The band is very adjustable and is very clear to read. It appears to be accurate which gives me confidence. It is supplied in a rigid plastic storage box which is easy to open yet keeps the product neat and tidy along with an instructions booklet. It is supplied with batteries so ready to use as soon as it arrives. It saves a trip to the doctor's surgery and is more accurate as you can take your BP at home.
customer_reviews.author: charlie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and convenient
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for a month to monitor my blood pressure as requested by my primary doctor. It was easy to use and I checked its accuracy by doing a manual blood pressure on my teenager then taking the blood pressure with they Hylogy cuff. The readings were always within a couple of points. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chelle Perry

customer_reviews.title: Blood Pressure Monitor
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this blood pressure monitor for my mother in law because the last couple of times she's gone to the doctors her blood pressure has been high and the doctor recommended her to keep checking herself. First I checked her with my manual blood pressure cuff and then I took it with this monitor and let me tell you this monitor was on point with the numbers. So far its been working for her. So I really recommend this to anyone looking for an easy to use blood pressure monitor. You won't regret purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: Aflores

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate at all
customer_reviews.text: Compared the readings from this to readings from a professional aneroid sphygmomanometer taken by a registered nurse - they were not even close. While the aneroid sphygmomanometer readings were very repeatable, the HYLOGY readings were all over the place and not even close to the accurate aneroid sphygmomanometer. Returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Joe W.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The unit gave wildly diverse readings when used 3x over a five minute period with only slight shift in placement on the wrist. Wrist reading is much more difficult to get accurate on a consistent basis. User manual is very small and in very tiny print - almost need a magnifying glass. I gave the unit more than a month to perform to expectation. That meant i could not return it ... ah well, twenty some bucks down the toilet. RECOMMENDATION? Get an upper arm cuff unit - I did and am satisfied
customer_reviews.author: dave m

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO USE
customer_reviews.text: I am skeptic about using a digital BP monitor because they said "it's not accurate" but I have a resident who gets hurt every time I use a BP cuff on her arms so I bought this. It is accurate, I have tried It many times. the memory is a plus, date and time. clear and easy to understand. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Bought a Second One
customer_reviews.text: This product works well enough that I bought a second one to give to a friend. Great customer service from the seller as well. If you're looking for an affordable BP monitor that works well, I recommend this item and this company.
customer_reviews.author: caseyrebel

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. The wrist monitor goes around your wrist and is secured by velcro. When turned on the cuff inflates and your blood pressure is recorded along with your heart rate. It takes two AAA batteries. If you need to know if your blood pressure is high or low then this is a very good, small and convenient way of doing it. If you follow the instructions properly then it is accurate but you must read the instructions thoroughly and follow them. This is not a problem with the device but a reflection of how difficult blood pressure can be to monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Shuai

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: The blood pressure readings were way too low. The heart rate monitor was very accurate but it's like buying a car with no steering wheel. So driving the 20 miles round trip to the ups store to return it was an unwanted extra cost that I could have put towards the purchase of a better monitor. I wish my blood pressure really was 100/67, it perked me up for two seconds.
customer_reviews.author: pateo

customer_reviews.title: Beware its reading accuracy
customer_reviews.text: I need to take Irbesartan medicine to control my blood pressure. Because of this, I occasionally need to check my blood pressure. This blood pressure monitor is really easy to use. I don't need to roll up my sleeve at all or can't find the pulse. Just keep the monitor at the same level as your heart, then press the biggest (purple) button. It comes with a compact professional case. This handy little thing makes the blood pressure checking job really easy. However, its reading accuracy are poor.
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate BP monitor
customer_reviews.text: Big monitor and very easy to read. I use it to monitor my blood pressure before and after I work out, it’s very accurate because every time I measure my BP, I do it three times in a row to check if there’s any difference, the result is always pretty consistent.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: once u get used to the exact position how unit needs to be positioned on your wrist, works great! . I even tried back-to-back measurements: they were within 1-2 points which is negligible. I can definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Kolber

customer_reviews.title: Blood Pressure Measurements Made Simple
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to read. Takes a little bit of time to adjust your arm just right so there aren't any false reads. A little trial and error, but honestly, by the 2nd or 3rd time, it works fine. Its quick takes total of about 2mins. Setup is pretty simple. Records your reading with time and date stamp so no need to have a pen and paper around. The storage box is perfect. Not small, but not huge either. Keeps its dust free and easy to store and find. Comes with a manual and warranty card; batteries included. Would recommend to anyone needing their pressure readouts readily available.
customer_reviews.author: Shadischa Tate

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it is to put on and use. I'm a bit concerned that my first readings were all so very different. However, I think I have found the best way to hold my arm at heart level without influencing the reading. I'm hopeful this will be a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah J. Likes

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Fast, and Accurate
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an old wrist monitor (a different brand) that was literally falling apart. I'm loving it! My old monitor was held together with duct tape, near the end, but I knew it to be accurate. The new Hylogy agrees with it quite well. My old one was slow and pumped to a pressure that was actually somewhat painful. The Hylogy doesn't pump nearly as tightly, and so results are much quicker. I have age-related vision problems, but the large display is very easy for me to read, even without my glasses. I would recommend it to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Buck

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Will not correctly read the BP of anyone in our house, constant error codes, BP readings of 230/200. ?????
customer_reviews.author: lauriefl777

customer_reviews.title: Nice home use blood pressure monitor
customer_reviews.text: I am pregnant and the doctor asked me to keep an eye on my blood pressure closely. So I have been searching for a home use blood pressure monitor on Amazon and this is the most inexpensive one that I found. I haven’t really expected it to be such a good one given the price I paid but it is so nice! Small but functional, the instructions are easy to understand and it can record the data for 2 persons. I would highly recommend it if you are also in search of a inexpensive but fully functional blood pressure monitor.
customer_reviews.author: qin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very efficient product. I use it to monitor my pressure at work. If easily fits anywhere and it is convenient to use at any time of the day. If you get stressed out at work, you can easily check you blood pressure. You can regulate and keep track of where your tension is coming from. Here’s to good health. Always, protect your heart. This is a good product to have and use at work and at home. It fits easily into your purse and/or work bag. I would highly recommend this particular product to anyone and at any time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best usage for monitoring my blood pressure daily
customer_reviews.text: I never used this kind of blood pressure monitor before, it's really easy to use, one click and it start to pump and measure the pressure. only in a min and I get the result. It's better than the one on your arm. hopefully the accuracy is the one I can trust!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Awesome

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it to ALL my patients
customer_reviews.text: This is such a small and well made BP monitor that I recommend it to all of my patients. Although it doesn't have the smart phone features, for its price and build quality this is the one to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Great for on the go
customer_reviews.text: I needed another option to use in the field to get a blood pressure if all the others fail. I really like the large display so I can read the numbers easily. It will be very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Quick and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the traditional big air pump surround the upper arm, this wrist pressure monitor is a lot more convenient to track my high blood pressure. Since it’s small and compact, it is easy to be stored at home. We are very happy to keep one pressure monitor in our home instead of go to the doctors.
customer_reviews.author: YC

customer_reviews.title: Compact and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It is compact for easy storage. It is easier to wrap around my wrist than an older version I purchased 6 years ago. The feature of 'averaging' readings is convenient. Also nice it has storage for two users. Product everything advertised. Shipped promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Great to monitor your health
customer_reviews.text: Simply operated. Large screen gives clear readings. It can shutdown automatically without operation in 30 seconds to save energy. It can measure heartbeats, pulse, systolic and diastolic blood pressure exactly. High quality and durable, price is acceptable and worth to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Huy Le

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Product not working now 8 months after purchase. Followed directions to get working again but nothing worked and item still not working. Past return date. Very disappointed in this item.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and accurate and easy
customer_reviews.text: Got tired of my old one with the cuff that goes on the upper arm and error messages. Did and internet search and found this one in the top 5 and a good price so gave it a try. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex R

customer_reviews.title: How easy it was to set-up
customer_reviews.text: This Hylogy wrist monitor is an excellent product, which I'm very impressed with. It's much faster with the readings, then others I've owned. I would highly recommend it. Also it has an excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: It's whatever
customer_reviews.text: I don't prefer wrist BPs but thought I'd try it. As a hospice nurse, sometimes it's more convenient to use this method versus the manual cuff. But I found it rarely gave me an accurate reading. It's easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: The item is easy to use, but I think the readings are often inaccurate. There is alot of inconsistency with the readings. If you test once and retest immediately afterwards, the readings are completely different.
customer_reviews.author: Teneka Striblin

customer_reviews.title: Quality of product seems high.
customer_reviews.text: BP monitor delivered day after ordered with Prime. Seemed to be very close reading to BP arm cuff. Easily set up and large display. Update: Spoke too soon. Got many error readings and BP much lower than cuff. Procrastinated and won’t be returning at this point. Purchase a BP machine with cuff if you can afford to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn M. Kinder

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: My wife purchased this item to monitor her blood pressure. My Wife's Review: While this item was very easy to read and okay to use, it did not work correctly for me. I would get low readings that were all over the place then would have one reading that was really high. I followed the directions that were given and still had readings everywhere. I do not know if my wrists are too small for this item or if it was the item itself but it did not work for me. I will be returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Cook

customer_reviews.title: Easy Use BP Cuff
customer_reviews.text: Great wrist Blood Pressure Cuff I give it 100 % recognition . I Gave to my Father and it work out great for him He was very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Having used many blood pressure cuffs this is the worst one I have come across. The readings are so varied that they can't be trusted. This is a toy. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Small & Accurate BLood Pressure Monitir
customer_reviews.text: We have been looking for a small accurate BLood Pressure monitor for some time. This Blood Pressure monitor did the job. It is easy to use and because of the size is always close by.
customer_reviews.author: RayInArizona

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Wife bought it and hasnt complained. I used it and what I like is that you can setup 2 profiles and it records your test. It allows you to view previous test
customer_reviews.author: MZ

customer_reviews.title: Life saver.
customer_reviews.text: Has worked several times for finding out what bp is running at. Got to hospital to find med levels running low.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Cammack

customer_reviews.title: TWO MONTHS AND IT IS DEAD
customer_reviews.text: Was a little skeptical on this. But got it and it works great. Although had to use other batteries then what came with it. **UPDATE Well 2 months and it is dead does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Marcm

customer_reviews.title: Prefer the arm cuff...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to vary a good deal, not confident with the performance. I do not believe the problem is the device, rather no wrist device seems as accurate as an arm cuff...
customer_reviews.author: jOHN aLLEN

customer_reviews.title: BE CAREFUL ,  if you get Xtreme high numbers it not you it the monitor
customer_reviews.text: Wrist Blood Pressure Monitor HYLOGY give 100 different pressure reading minutes apart. Should not be on the market as it causes pantick with serious heart conditions.
customer_reviews.author: TazStazs

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 95 year old mother. She has a new doctor and he wanted home BP readings to compare to his office to see if she just has “white coat syndrome”. She and I both love it. It is very easy for her to use on her own and it is very easy to read. I’m considering buying a second one for me to have at my house.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L.

customer_reviews.title: This one is a keeper
customer_reviews.text: I take my blood pressure every day. Sometimes several times a day I compare my pressure on another blood pressure monitor that I have had and is very reliable. They both come very close in measurement. This one is a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: vagma

customer_reviews.title: Terribly inaccurate and throws multiple errors
customer_reviews.text: This BP cuff is the most touchy I have ever used. It throws several errors therefore burns through batteries unnecessarily quickly. I use cuffs several times a day so when I have to risk not getting a reading or even an accurate reading it’s frustrating. Don’t buy this item. It’s not worth the headache to just have to buy a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Elise Fenelon

customer_reviews.title: Small and compact but not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to carry with us on trips because of it's small footprint and it also come with a travel case. The feel if it is nice and well made and is easy to work but it doesn't provide accurate readings.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah & Shawn

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This device came well packaged and is so very easy to use. It also stores the readings which is useful when going to the doctor and recalling this data for medical records. Great item at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: easy to read blood pressure cuff
customer_reviews.text: Awesome blood pressure cuff for anyone who needs it. Quickly gets your bp and very easy to read the display. The cuff comes with a nice case to protect it. Instructions are to put the cuff on your left wrist and make sure it's tight to get an accurate reading. Highly recommended for the price!!!
customer_reviews.author: John le

customer_reviews.title: l cannot trust it. I’m asking for a replacement. Please advise
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine at first but now it keeps signaling E-3. Battery changes don’t help. I am thoroughly disgusted. My 2nd one worked until a month ago. It started showing very low readings. Checked it against my doctors and it was far off . I’d like replacement.please advise. Serenakoss@hotmail.com
customer_reviews.author: serena

customer_reviews.title: Hylogy Blood Pressure Monitor
customer_reviews.text: My doctor wanted me to check my blood pressure at home daily. So, i bought this little wrist monitor and it is so easy to use and is accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Diane A

customer_reviews.title: Easy like Sunday Mornings !
customer_reviews.text: I am a RN by profession and love this purchase for quick home visits to my patients. I love that it could fit the smallest and even my obese patients as the velcro cuff is adjustable. First, I purchased this because it was FDA regulated. Loved that it came with Batteries as well. It was easy to set up time and date and tested it on myself, on both wrist and it was pretty accurate. I love the sleek design and the hard case it comes in for storing. It is compact and convenient. But most of all, efficient and accurate
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Returned for refund.
customer_reviews.text: The first 2 times I used it, it gave me a reading. After that it was mostly error messages. Not sure if this unit was defective or just poorly made but I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: meme

customer_reviews.title: Great Portability
customer_reviews.text: Accurate readings, easy to use.....but most importantly - compact size for portability. That makes this unit great for travel. Comes in a hard case but fits in the palm of your hand. Easy to set up with the current date and time. And keeps data for two users!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: The monitor works as advertised. I had a small issue with the monitor when I first received it, but the company replaced it with no problems. Customer service is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: MLM5L

product_meta.title: Wrist Blood Pressure Monitor HYLOGY Blood Pressure Cuff Fully Automatic High Blood Pressure Machine with Irregular Heartbeat Monitoring, Adjustable Wrist Cuff and Portable Case (Gray)
feature_bullets: MORE USER-FRIENDLY Available for 2 people, 180 sets of memory for large capacity storage. Checking daily blood pressure date with just one button
SAFE AND ACCURATE Simple operation and fast measure process. Serving as a good health companion for home use
LARGE LCD-DISPLAY Easy-to-read screen indicates your blood pressure level, more convenient for the elderly and the visually impaired
LIGHTWEIGHT AND PORTABLE Lightweight designed. No matter traveling or at home, monitoring at any time. Small and convenient, one-button measurement, easy to operate by pressing the M key

TWO YEARS QUALITY GUARANTEE If you encounter any problem or need support, please feel free to contact us through following E-mail: support@hylogy.com. We offer 24-month warranty and replacement services for our beloved customer

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
